description:
Michael Kiwanuka describes Jimmy Jam's work on "Small Changes" album
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube

As singer-songwriter Michael Kiwanuka gets ready to release his next album, "Small Changes" (out November 15 on @geffenrecords), he visited The Current studio to chat with host Bill DeVille. During the interview, Kiwanuka described how legendary Minneapolis musician Jimmy Jam contributed to the record. 

Credits
Guest – @MichaelKiwanukaOfficial 
Host – Bill DeVille
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video – Megan Lundberg
Audio – Cameron Wiley
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
